originalText.text: I’ve been a very satisfied patient of Dr. Minutoli for the past 30 years and have referred a number of friends and my own patients to him. The people I have referred have been very pleased with the care they have received. He’s responsive and always professional, and stays up to date with the latest research and treatment recommendations. He is friendly and has great integrity. When I contracted Covid on vacation last summer, I reached out to him on a day the office was closed, and he got back to me and was helpful. It’s easy to make appointments, he respects your time, asks thoughtful questions, and he thoroughly explains whatever condition you’re dealing with. I recommend him unreservedly.

originalText.text: I have been with him for over 25 years and he saved my life several times by listening to my concerns and sending me to the rightspecialists

originalText.text: I have been going to Dr. Minutoli for years and have nothing but praise for the level of service he provides. He is attentive, honest, knowledgeable, personable, responsive and readily available. It is difficult in this day and age to find service like this any longer.

text.text: I have been going to Dr. Minutoli for years and have nothing but praise for the level of service he provides. He is attentive, honest, knowledgeable, personable, responsive and readily available. It is difficult in this day and age to find service like this any longer.

originalText.text: Dr. Minutoli has ben my PCP for over ten years. He's an excellent doctor who communicates clearly and effectively. I have benefited from his service and commitment through it all: annoying updates on insurance policies regarding referrals, immediate response and support to any (otherwise terrifying) health event, availability to see in person with great bedside manner and not lengthy wait times. I appreciate him very much

originalText.text: I have been seeing Dr. Minutoli since 1989!  It has been 31 years and I can attest that he is the BEST!  He educates you about your condition, even draws the situation graphically on a board and explains how the medicine and approach treats you!  He is accessible all the time and makes accommodations for scheduling!  He is AMAZING!
